## At a Glance


## Ingredients

- 2 bags frozen edamame
- 1 can white beans
- 1 cucumber
- 1 belle pepper
- 1 shallot
- 2 green onions
- Sesame seeds
- Seaweed snacks for serving

Miso dressing

- 2 tbsp miso
- 1/4 cup red wine vinegar
- 2 tbsp sesame oil
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 2 tsp lime juice
- 3 tbsp maple syrup
- 1 tbsp minced garlic

## Instructions

Mix all the ingredients except the dressing together. Mix the dressing separately and then poor over. 

Serve over rice or with seaweed snacks.
